ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/99 8:16:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time, mat@cythere.com ... Nope.  As A necro I can tell you there are both stackable and non-stackable
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/99 8:16:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time, mat@...
writes:

> I found Ice of Velious several times on Pickclaws in Highkeep. Not very
> often, but more often than runes anyway.
> As for mages and necro words looking different, I agree it's a bit
> confusing. I *think* (but am not sure at all) that mage words are
> stackable and necro words aren't.
Nope. As A necro I can tell you there are both stackable and non-stackable
for necros. (not sure why this is...) so that is not the key. It is just a
matter of figuring it out. And maybe there is even some crossover (maybe
words of Dominion... the most common word I have found. I have 14 of them,
glad they stack!)

> Either that or they forgot to make some
> words stackable and those I checked matched that rule.
I do wish they made them all stackable! I have been on a long quest for
handmade backpacks because of that... need all 70 slots in my locker to hold
words. (one slot for the book)

Sonoroud Tomebinder
